description:
Present you business, your ideas, your thesis, your researches, the results of your work is crucial wherever you are active.

If you do not do the right presentation you will not amaze your audience, you will not entice your potential customers.

In this course I will show you how to use Microsoft (TM) PowerPoint to create amazing animated presentations.

I will show you how to turn a boring layout into a dynamic and powerful slide show.

You will learn:

  • how to use PowerPoint
  • what is a slide master
  • how to create and format a slide master and its elements and layout
  • how to setup slide shows
  • how to define animations, showing objects and elements at specific time instants and after triggering specific events
  • how to create new shapes and new images out of existing components
  • how to create cartoons to generate powerful slide shows
  • how to add media to a PowerPoint presentation
  • how to display processes, flow charts, charts, histograms and organization charts in PowerPoint

At the end you will be able to create your own PowerPoint slide shows with animations, texts and images.
title: Create amazing animated presentations in PowerPoint
